title: Beacon of Humanity: First Flag on the Martian Frontier
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed, expressive illustration, volumetric lighting, Modern Anime style, 16:9 aspect ratio. A heroic astronaut wearing a detailed, futuristic gray spacesuit with glowing blue accents, kneeling dramatically on a dusty, reddish, cratered planet surface (Mars-like). The astronaut is firmly planting a large, deep blue flag (featuring a rocket and Earth insignia). Dust plumes kick up around the figure. In the background, a massive, magnificent view of Earth looms against the dark, star-filled space sky. A sleek, white sci-fi lander rests nearby. Cinematic composition, warm ochre and deep blue color palette.
negativePrompt: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, blurry, watermark, signature, poorly drawn face, disfigured, mutated, ugly, tiling, duplicate
